summary: A collection of kitchen tools as modders resources for static and misc item usage
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=============================
Strotis Kitchen Tools Resource for Skyrim

Version 1.1
=============================

by Stroti

Converted by Tamira

=============================

Modder's resource
=============================

Adds:

6 different cooking pots
2 different frying pans
4 different glass jars
2 different tablets
teapot
milkpot
funnel
rolling pin
knife, fork and spoon
wooden spatula
dipper
whisk

New in version 1.1:
Bottle Carrier
Grinder

For the meshes there are 2 folders:
The objects in the folder KitchenToolsStatic have static collision and should be added as statics in the Creation Kit.
The objects in the folder KitchenToolsClutter have clutter (havoked) collision and should be added as misc items in the Creation Kit.

There is an alternative grey metallic texture included in the texture folder, if the copper-design does not suit your taste.
To use the alternative texture, delete the files copper.dds and copper_n.dds in the folder texture/stroti/kitchentools and rename the files copperReplacer.dds and copperReplacer_n.dds to copper.dds and copper_n.dds

This is a conversion of Stroti's Kitchen Tools Resource, originally published for Oblivion. You can find the original resource files here:
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/37868//?
The grinder and the bottle carrier are part of Strotis miscellaneous meshes:
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/41718/?

No demo esp included.

=================
Tools used:
=================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox
Gimp

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modder's resource.You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.

You may use this resource in Skyrim Special Edition too. All files should work without problems.

Do not upload to other sites.

Stroti has quit modding and will no longer be active on the forums.
I have his personal permission to convert his Oblivion resources and to upload them.

=================
Credits:
=================

Stroti for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
Bethesda for the TES games
Mellowtraumatic and BrettM for testing
author: Stroti and Tamira
